subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Tennis
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mr. Toley was a top collegiate tennis coach who led the University of Southern California to 10 N.C.A.A. team titles and directed Mexico in the Davis Cup.
snippet: Mr. Toley was a top collegiate tennis coach who led the University of Southern California to 10 N.C.A.A. team titles and directed Mexico in the Davis Cup.
